name: svox-tools
description: Command line tools for working with Smooth Voxels

scripts.package: rm -rf dist/* ; pkg -t linux -o dist/svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-linux/vox2svox build/vox2svox.js ; pkg -t linux -o dist/svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-linux/svox2gltf build/svox2gltf.js ; pkg -t macos -o dist/svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-macos/vox2svox build/vox2svox.js ; pkg -t macos -o dist/svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-macos/svox2gltf build/svox2gltf.js ; pkg -t win -o dist/svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-win/vox2svox build/vox2svox.js ; pkg -t win -o dist/svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-win/svox2gltf build/svox2gltf.js ; gzexe dist/svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-linux/vox2svox ; gzexe dist/svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-linux/svox2gltf ; rm dist/svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-linux/*~; cd dist ; tar cfz svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-linux.tar.gz svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-linux ; tar cfz svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-macos.tar.gz svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-macos ; tar cfz svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-win.tar.gz svox-tools-${npm_package_version}-win

author: Greg Fodor
